description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Control your Sentinel Mark 2 defence droid and protect the colony; upgrade your weapons and shoot super hot plasma at the enemy tanks. Campaign mode, with protect the convoy, destroy the fuel dumps, wave of attacks, and more! Mayhem madness with Arcade modes to test your shooting skills for immediate destruction!
